priceInformation1: The here shown Online Price is a reference price that does not include freight, customs and taxes and is not maintained in all global currencies.
priceInformation2: To get your individual offer (in your local currency), please send us your request, so that your local Pfeiffer Vacuum Company / Partner Company will then provide you with your individual offer and pricing.
deliveryDetails: Please send us your inquiry, so that we can inform you about an exact delivery time.
